alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:18AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tippah and Prentiss Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1118 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wheeler, or 8 miles northwest of Baldwyn, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Baldwyn, Jumpertown, Thrashers, Wheeler, Marietta, Thrasher, Blackland, Gaston, Geeville, Hobo Station, Frankstown and Altitude. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
